property.name: Rules
property.value: Oubleday ikestray Enwhay ouyay eakspay ay onnay-igpay-atinlay ordway, acrificesay Atinlay Igpay.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Isthay iecepay ofay avorflay exttay oesn'tday eallyray aysay anythingay.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target attacking creature. Then remove it from the game. Then put it into the absolutely-removed-from-the-freaking-game-forever zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a spell, you may gain ½ life for each word in that spell's name.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Step 1: I believe in a power and toughness greater than myself . . . ."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Gotcha - If an opponent touches the table with their hand, you may say "Gotcha" When you do, return Cardpecker from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spells you cast cost o½ less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: And you thought Yawgmoth drove a hard bargain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Circle of Protection: Art enters the battlefield, choose an artist. {1}{W}: The next time a source of your choice with art by the chosen artist would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. {1}{W}: Return Circle of Protection: Art to its owner's hand.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jim "Stop the Da Vinci Beatdown" Pavelec

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}, Give an opponent a nonland card you own from outside the game: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to you or Collector Protector this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Drawn Together enters the battlefield, choose an artist. Creatures with art by the chosen artist get +2/+2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My Pete Venters theme deck is nearly complete. Then I shall be unstoppable Bwahahahaaa" - Pete Venters

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may stand up and say in a deep, booming voice, "Presenting . . . " and that creature's name. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ogre appealed the match loss and got it downgraded to a warning.

cards.card: <property name="Flavor" value="Synonyms for "erase" we haven't used: ablate, abrade, chafe, fray, frazzle, scuff, and scrub."/>

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}{W}: Fascist Art Director gains protection from the artist of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dear Mr. and Mrs. Cranford, After careful analysis of Jeremy's vocational testing, I feel that he is best suited for a career in either torture or art direction.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each attacking or blocking creature with the lowest collector number among attacking or blocking creatures has first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Yotian soldiers hoped that one day R+D would make an artifact creature whose name starts with Z. And in their dreams, it's a 4/1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may ask target player a yes-or-no question. If you do, that player answers the question truthfully and abides by that answer if able until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Don't cross him or you'll end up sleeping with the merfolk.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You and target opponent play Seven Questions with the top card of that player's library. If you win, prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn by a source of your choice. (To play Seven Questions, that player looks at the card, then you ask up to six yes-or-no questions about the card that they answer truthfully. You guess the card's name - that's question seven - then the player reveals the card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Spells cast by players wearing at least one item of women's clothing cost {1} less to cast. (You can define women's clothing as you see fit. Be reasonable.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I said ‘Put him in a core set, not a corset'" - Richard Garfield, Ph.D.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the future, she may be a distinguished leader, a great scholar, or a decorated hero. These days all she does is pee the bed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Look at Me, I'm R+D comes into play, choose a number and a second number one higher or one lower than that number. All instances of the first chosen number on permanents, spells, and cards in any zone are the second chosen number.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you're shorter than an opponent, Man of Measure gets +0/+1 and has first strike. As long as you're taller than an opponent, Man of Measure gets +1/+0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You need to be this tall to play this card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Target player gains 2½ life. • Prevent the next 2½ damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. Gotcha - If an opponent says "save" or "life," you may say "Gotcha" When you do, return Save Life from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you're standing, Standing Army has vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They're the chair-men of the bored.

property.name: Rules
property.value: "Until end of turn" and "this turn" effects don't end.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mongo's fleas no longer bothered him. But the family of goblins that had moved in behind his left ear was starting to get really irritating.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each word in its name.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Suck on it, Stangg" - Sol'kanar the Swamp King

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: This card's name becomes the card name of your choice. Activate anywhere, anytime.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: {1}: This card's flavor text becomes the flavor text of your choice. (This ability doesn't work because it's flavor text, not rules text (but neither does this reminder text, so you figure it out).)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player plays a spell that counters a spell that has been played or a player plays a spell that comes into play with counters, that player may counter the next spell played or put an additional counter on a permanent that has already been played, but not countered.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. Whenever a permanent that shares an artist with another permanent you control enters the battlefield, untap Artful Looter.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: PRICELESS PIC PILFERED Painting Found Abandoned in Graveyard Merfolk Decry Wizards' Treatment

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} more to cast for each ten years you've been alive. Avatar of Me's power is equal to your height in feet and its toughness is equal to your American shoe size. Round to the nearest ½. Avatar of Me is the color of your eyes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target permanent's artist becomes the artist of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He gives credit where credit isn't due.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Ron "Don't You Dare Change Me" Spears

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bursting Beebles can't be blocked as long as defending player controls two or more nonland permanents that share an artist.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like thousands of others, the beebles quit Magic for several years following the release of the Mercadian Masques set.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Carnivorous Death-Parrot unless you say its flavor text.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Save a kill spell to deal with this guy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If Cheatyface is in your hand, you may sneak Cheatyface onto the battlefield. If an opponent catches you right away, that player may exile Cheatyface. Flying

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Double Header enters the battlefield, you may return target permanent with a two-word name to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Players that don't read flavor text aren't too bright, sorta smell, and dress funny. But let's just keep this between us, okay? They can get kind of violent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}o½.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't worry about it. It happens to every mage sooner or later."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose an artist. Tap all untapped permanents with art by that artist or untap all tapped permanents with art by that artist.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Who knew an 8˝ by 10˝ could feel like a 2˝ by 4˝?

property.name: Artist
property.value: Alan "Don't Feel Like You Have to Pick Me" Pollack

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}: Greater Morphling gains your choice of banding, bushido 1, double strike, fear, flying, first strike, haste, landwalk of your choice, protection from a color of your choice, provoke, rampage 1, shadow, or trample until end of turn. {2}: Greater Morphling becomes the colors of your choice until end of turn. {2}: Greater Morphling becomes the creature type of your choice until end of turn. {2}: Greater Morphling's expansion symbol becomes the symbol of your choice until end of turn. {2}: Greater Morphling's art becomes by the artist of your choice until end of turn. {2}: Greater Morphling gets +2/-2 or -2/+2 until end of turn. {2}: Untap Greater Morphling.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just wait till I get my Krark-Clan Ironworks, Genesis Chamber, and Grinding Station. Oh yeah, and a second Myr Retriever."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature As Loose Lips enters the battlefield, choose a sentence with eight or fewer words. Enchanted creature has flying. Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, that player may say the chosen sentence. If they don't, you draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Your sentence can't be longer than this one.

cards.card: <property name="Flavor" value="1|= y()u (4|\| r3@d 7%%5, y0|_| /\r3 @ IVI0/\/$+3|2 +33|<"/>

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a nonland card name, then reveal the top card of your library. If that card has the chosen name, you draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: mise 'miz v alter. of might as well (1997) 1: to win when you don't deserve to 2: to top-deck the "tings" you need 3: to be rewarded by an opponent's bad luck 4: to coin a phrase that spreads through the tournament scene like wildfire 5: to fling a monkey 6: to split firewood using a sharp instrument 7: To burn

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}, Say your middle name: Moniker Mage gains shroud until end of turn. {U}, Say an opponent's middle name: Moniker Mage gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose target opponent and target creature they control. You and that player have a breath-holding contest. If you win, you gain control of that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Interesting tidbit: Surveys show that the card Ow has one of the most popular pieces of flavor text in the Unglued expansion.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control permanents with names that include all twenty-six letters of the English alphabet, you win the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The quick onyx goblin jumps over the lazy dwarf.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Gotcha - If an opponent says a number, you may say "Gotcha" When you do, return Number Crunch from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Did you know this creature has flying? Are you aware that any time you say something that isn't a question, when a player points out this fact first, they gain control of Question Elemental?

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may play cards as though they were other cards of your choice with the same mana cost. You can't choose the same card twice. (Mana cost includes color.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: And yea he doth spake: "Let there be Magic."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Smart Ass attacks, choose a card name. If defending player has no cards with the chosen name in their hand, they may reveal their hand. If they don't reveal their hand, Smart Ass can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't get it. Why doesn't anybody like me?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. Gotcha - If an opponent says "spell" or "counter," you may say "Gotcha" When you do, return Spell Counter from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The phases of each player's turn are reversed. (The phases are, in reverse order, ending, postcombat main, combat, precombat main, and beginning.) As long as there are more than two players in the game, the turn order is reversed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Here on going is heck the what?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose an artist. Exile the top six cards of your library, then reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card with art by the chosen artist. Put that card in your hand and exile all other cards revealed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He wanders the land in search of Good Ass.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When the names of three or more nonland permanents begin with the same letter, sacrifice Bloodletter. If you do, it deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That's not really an A. It's an Æ. They changed it! Wait, don't - " - Hœbrus Væm, Aerathi librarian, last words

property.name: Rules
property.value: Open a sealed Magic booster pack, reveal the cards, and put one of them into your hand. (Remove that card from your deck before beginning a new game.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Real men use Arabian Nights boosters.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature with reminder text. (Reminder text is any italicized text in parentheses that explains rules you already know.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Will players understand that the creature is being crushed by two parentheses? Not a chance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Players play a Magic subgame under the table, starting at 5 life and using their libraries as their decks. The winner searches their library for two cards, puts those cards into their hand, then shuffles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You and target creature's controller have a staring contest. If you win, destroy that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: True, Gargox had blinded himself for life, but the glass eyes never lost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The Fallen Apart enters the battlefield with two arms and two legs. Whenever damage is dealt to The Fallen Apart, remove an arm or a leg from it. The Fallen Apart can't attack if it has no legs and can't block if it has no arms.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Farewell to Arms enters the battlefield, choose a hand attached to an opponent's arm. When the chosen hand isn't behind its owner's back, sacrifice Farewell to Arms. If you do, that player discards their hand . . . of cards. (The lawyers wouldn't let us do it the other way.)

card.name: Infernal Spawn of Infernal Spawn of Evil

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, first strike, trample Once each turn, while you're searching your library, you may pay {1}{B}, reveal Infernal Spawn of Infernal Spawn of Evil from your library and say "I'm coming, too" If you do, Infernal Spawn of Infernal Spawn of Evil deals 2 damage to a player of your choice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonblack creature. Gotcha - If an opponent says "kill" or "destroy," you may say "Gotcha" When you do, return Kill Destroy from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, sacrifice Mother of Goons unless you insult that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Skip your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay X life. If you do, untap X permanents. Pay ½ life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose an artist other than Rebecca Guay. Target player reveals their hand and discards all nonland cards with art by the chosen artist.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The torches and pitchforks were no match for Rebecca's fans.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library and balance it on your body. When a balanced card falls or touches another balanced card, sacrifice Phyrexian Librarian.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player discards a card. Gotcha - If an opponent audibly flicks the cards in their hand, you may say "Gotcha" When you do, return Stop That from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Now for a squirt of lemon juice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Choose a word. Target player mills a card. If a card with the chosen word in its text box was milled this way, they lose 3 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player's skin or fingernail touches Vile Bile, that player loses 2 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Wet Willie of the Damned deals 2½ damage to any target and you gain 2½ life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ever the warrior, Glissa responded with a "wedgie from beyond Uranus."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of times the letter of your choice appears in that creature's name.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Get it? Bunnies, letters, -X/-X? Me neither." - Bucky, flavor text writer

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Working Stiff enters the battlefield, straighten your arms. When you bend an elbow, sacrifice Working Stiff.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Zombie Fanboy enters the battlefield, choose an artist. Whenever a permanent with art by the chosen artist is put into a graveyard, put two +1/+1 counters on Zombie Fanboy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The real advantage of being a zombie gamer? No one notices the stench.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy all nonland permanents with the first name alphabetically among nonland permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tired of always being picked last, the wizard Zzzyxas created the ultimate revenge.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each other Donkey gets +1½/+1½. Whenever another Donkey enters the battlefield, untap target creature and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Who wants to see a picture of a big hairy ass?

property.name: Rules
property.value: Madness {R}, cycling {1}{R}, kicker {2}{R}, flashback {3}{R}, buyback {4}{R} Blast from the Past deals 2 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When this creature dies, return Curse of the Fire Penguin to the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deal Damage deals 4 damage to any target. Gotcha - If an opponent says "deal" or "damage," you may say "Gotcha" When you do, return Deal Damage from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, target opponent chooses whether Dumb Ass attacks this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Envying the intelligence of goblins is a bad place to be.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You and target opponent play a best two-out-of-three Rock, Paper, Scissors match. If you win, Face to Face deals 5 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Befuddled by this new game, Argg longed for the days of Rock, Rock, Rock.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from wordy (Something is wordy if it has four or more lines of rules text.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The pen is mightier than the sword.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you speak, sacrifice Goblin Mime.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Pretending to be inside an invisible box was easy enough for Brug. It was finding the invisible door that caused him problems.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal a card from your hand at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: SECRET AGENT PD042198 LICENSE TO BE KILLED

property.name: Rules
property.value: Say "Goblin S.W.A.T. Team": Put a +1/+1 counter on Goblin S.W.A.T. Team unless an opponent swats the table within five seconds. Activate only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They put the "special" in special weapons and tactics.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Add {R} for each nonland permanent with art by the artist of your choice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What began as black Has slowly shifted to red. Fickle color pie.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a creature or land: Add {HR}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Poached Rukh Eggs Rock Cooked Rock Unicorn-on-the-Cob Wormfang Turtle Soup

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Orcish Paratroopers enters the battlefield, flip it from a height of at least one foot. Sacrifice Orcish Paratroopers unless it turns over completely at least once during the flip and lands face up.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: IOU one parashoot - Urk, mogg fanatic

property.name: Rules
property.value: Punctuate deals damage to target creature equal to half the number of punctuation marks in that creature's text box. (The punctuation marks are? , ; : - - ( ) / " " ‘ ' + .)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Pygmy Giant deals X damage to target creature, where X is a number in the sacrificed creature's text box.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "487. You're welcome." - Bucky, flavor text writer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Red-Hot Hottie deals damage to a creature, put a third-degree-burn counter on that creature. It gains "At the beginning of each end step, sacrifice this creature unless you scream ‘Aaah' at the top of your lungs."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She was winning the Dominarian "Are You Hot?" competition until disaster struck during the wet T-shirt round.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Super haste (This may attack the turn before you cast it. (You may put this card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking during your declare attackers step. If you do, you lose the game at the beginning of your next turn's end step unless you pay this card's mana cost during that turn.))

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sauté deals 3½ damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Selecting the proper beeble is the key to a good sauté. The pinker the fur and the heartier the yelp, the more succulent the beeble will be when you pop it in your mouth." - Asmoranomardicadaistinaculdacar, The Underworld Cookbook,

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Six-y Beast enters the battlefield, you secretly put six or fewer +1/+1 counters on it, then an opponent guesses the number of counters. If that player guesses right, sacrifice Six-y Beast after it enters the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target land. Gotcha - If an opponent touches their face, you may say "Gotcha" When you do, return Touch and Go from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Judge's ruling: The interior of the face still counts as the face, so a nose-pick is legitimate grounds for saying "Gotcha"

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures have haste. Players play with the top card of their libraries revealed. Noninstant, nonsorcery cards on top of a library are on the battlefield under their owner's control in addition to being in that library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever a player casts a spell, put a chip counter on its mana value. B-I-N-G-O gets +9/+9 for each set of three numbers in a row with chip counters on them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There was a farmer, had a hound . . .

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gotcha - If an opponent says "creature" or "guy," you may say "Gotcha" When you do, return Creature Guy from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There once was a player named Quinn, . . .

property.name: Rules
property.value: Elvish House Party's power and toughness are each equal to the current hour, using the twelve-hour system.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The party was going strong for nearly an hour past midnight - then all of a sudden it just petered out.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fat Ass gets +2/+2 and has trample as long as you're eating. (Gum isn't food. We checked.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Our lawyers say no matter how funny it would be, we can't encourage players to eat the cards. Hear that? Whatever you do, don't eat the delicious cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Form of the Squirrel enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token. You lose the game when that creature leaves the battlefield. Creatures can't attack you. You have shroud. You can't cast spells.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}, {T}: Return target card with a ½ on it from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bitten by radioactive beebles in a freak algebra accident, young Ricky Robertson discovered he'd gained the ability to harness the awesome power of fractions

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Gluetius Maximus enters the battlefield, an opponent chooses one of your fingers. (Thumbs are fingers, too.) When the chosen finger isn't touching Gluetius Maximus, sacrifice Gluetius Maximus.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain life equal to your age.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: R+D Comments BB 10/10: Why does a life-gaining card show an old lady killing people? MR (10/10/03): We'll fix it in the flavor text.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures with art by the artist of your choice get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: WARNING: THE DOMINARIAN SURGEON GENERAL HAS FOUND THAT SAVAGE BEATINGS CAN LEAD TO CHUMP BLOCKS, LIFE REDUCTION, AND EVEN GAME LOSS.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Keeper of the Sacred Word enters the battlefield, choose a word. Whenever an opponent says the chosen word, Keeper of the Sacred Word gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: This is not a subliminal message.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. If you sang a song the whole time you were searching and shuffling, you may untap that land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gotcha - If an opponent laughs, you may say "Gotcha" When you do, return Laughing Hyena from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Two muffins are baking in an oven. One muffin says to the other muffin, ‘It's getting hot in here, huh?' The other muffin says, ‘Aagh A talking muffin'"

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Monkey Monkey Monkey enters the battlefield, choose a letter. Monkey Monkey Monkey gets +1/+1 for each nonland permanent whose name begins with the chosen letter.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many matches make more madcap monkey mayhem.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gotcha - If an opponent says a word that's in the name of a card in your graveyard, you may say "Gotcha" When you do, return that card to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gemini (May 21-June 21) This week is a good time to branch out and meet others, but don't forget your roots. Avoid commitments and open flame.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Phasing, cumulative upkeep {1}, echo {G}{G}, fading 3, bands with other Dinosaurs, protection from Homarids, snow-covered plainswalk, flanking, rampage 2

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These kids today with their collector numbers and their newfangled tap symbol. Twenty Black Lotuses and twenty Plague Rats. Now that's real Magic."

card.name: Our Market Research Shows That Players Like Really Long Card Names So We Made this Card to Have the Absolute Longest Card Name Ever Elemental

property.name: Rules
property.value: Art rampage 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked by a creature, it gets +2/+2 for each creature in the blocker's art beyond the first.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just call it OMRSTPLRLCNSWMTCTHTALCNEE for short.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you control two or more green permanents that share an artist, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost. Exile target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 6 PM (23) This Old Grove 98055 A rusted masticore makes a beautiful addition to any garden.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shoe Tree enters the battlefield with up to two shoe counters on it. Use your shoes as counters. Shoe Tree gets +1/+1 for each shoe counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It grows several feet a year.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You and target opponent arm-wrestle. If you win, create a 3/3 green Ape creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His friends at the gym never knew Garanth's secret shame. For years he had tried to walk away from professional arm wrestling, but hey - free monkeys.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have S.N.O.T. enter the battlefield stuck to another creature named S.N.O.T. If you do, all those creatures form a single creature. S.N.O.T.'s power and toughness are each equal to the square of the number of cards named S.N.O.T. stuck together to form it. (One is a 1/1, two are a 4/4, three are a 9/9, and four are a 16/16. If you manage to get -1 S.N.O.T.s stuck together, it's a 1/1.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Stone-Cold Basilisk blocks or becomes blocked by a creature with fewer letters in its name, destroy that creature at end of combat. (Punctuation and spaces aren't letters.) Whenever an opponent reads Stone-Cold Basilisk, that player is turned to stone until end of turn. Stoned players can't attack, block, cast spells, or activate abilities.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3½/+3½ until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 1/1 colorless Expansion-Symbol creature token for each different expansion symbol among permanents you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Everyone break into teams. Weaponry, you're with me. Nature group, meet by the palm tree. Stoneworks and metalworks, follow the anvil. Everyone else, gather around the giant V." - Sword of Kaldra

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Uktabi Kong enters the battlefield, destroy all artifacts. Tap two untapped Apes you control: Create a 1/1 green Ape creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I desire the acquisition of a potassium-rich fruit comestible of substantial magnitude."

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may say "Ach Hans, run It's the . . ." and the name of a creature card. If you do, search your library for a card with that name, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. That creature gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target silver-bordered or acorn permanent in any game you can see from your seat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Asses to ashes, Donkeys to dust.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Meddling Kids enters the battlefield, choose a word with four or more letters. Spells with the chosen word in their text box can't be cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: These kids know their four-letter words.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player sacrifices all permanents that are rare or mythic rare, then each player reveals their hand and discards all cards that are rare or mythic rare.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The only rare you'll ever need. Okay, not really.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You choose all targets for all spells and abilities.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Help us . . . R+D under mental domination of alien brain in jar . . . only chance . . . Gleemax's blatant disregard for flavor text . . . send help

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Letter Bomb enters the battlefield, sign it and shuffle it into target player's library. That player reveals each card they draw until they draw Letter Bomb. When that player draws Letter Bomb, it deals 19½ damage to them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, add {C}{C}. Activate only as an instant.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There was no darker or more evil creation in all the multiverse than that of the mana screw.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {+oo}. {100}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}: Say the flavor text on a card in your hand. Target opponent guesses that card's name. You may reveal that card. If you do and they guessed wrong, you draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: This card is named My First Tome.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}: Spin Pointy Finger of Doom in the middle of the table so that it rotates completely at least once, then destroy the closest permanent the finger points to.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I would have made a ‘Spin-The-Bottle' joke if I thought anyone reading this had ever played the game." - Bucky, flavor text writer

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Rod of Spanking deals 1 damage to target player. Then untap Rod of Spanking unless that player says "Thank you, sir. May I have another?"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Minutes before the campus watch busted pledge week at the Alpha Beta Unlimited house . . .

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Exile Time Machine and target nontoken creature you own. Return them to the battlefield at the beginning of your upkeep on your turn X in the next game you play with one of your opponents in this game, where X is the mana value of the exiled creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Togglodyte enters the battlefield turned on. Whenever a player casts a spell, toggle Togglodyte's ON/OFF switch. As long as Togglodyte is turned off, it can't attack or block, and prevent all damage it would deal.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cumulative upkeep - Say "Toy Boat" quickly. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on Toy Boat, then sacrifice it unless you say "Toy Boat" once for each age counter on it - without pausing between or fumbling it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, Discard a card: Search your library for a card that shares a complete word in its name with the discarded card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Water Gun Balloon Game enters the battlefield, each player puts a pop counter on "0." Whenever a player casts a spell, move that player's pop counter up one. Whenever a player's pop counter hits "5," that player creates a 5/5 pink Giant Teddy Bear creature token and resets all pop counters to "0."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {5}, Sacrifice World-Bottling Kit: Choose a Magic set. Exile all permanents with that set's expansion symbol except for basic lands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: City of Ass enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add one and one-half mana of any one color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play cards as written. Ignore all errata. {T}: Add {C}. (This mana is still added to your mana pool.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let them complain. As long as the addictive ink is working, we can do anything we want." PLAY AT YOUR OWN RISK

property.name: Rules
property.value: Premium spells cost {1} less to cast. Premium creatures get +1/+1.
